An optically - clear PET film coated with acrylic pressure - sensitive adhesive and with a white PET release liner.
这是一种高透光的PET膜,涂覆有丙烯酸压敏胶合剂,并且层压一个白色PET离型纸.
A PET plastic bottle . Soft drinks bottles made from the synthetic material PET, or polyethylene terephthalate.
软饮料的包装采用合成材料PET, 也就是聚乙烯对苯二酸制成.
The up to data developments in correction of PET and PET related devises are also introduced.
对校正算法的最新进展和PET相关设备中的校正算法也做了些介绍.
PET correction algorithms consist of a necessary part in the software of PET.
因此,校正算法是PET设备软件系统中所必不可少的组成部分.
The causes and countermeasures of explosion and leakage of PET blowing bottles for drink are analyzed.
分析了碳酸性饮料用PET吹塑 瓶爆裂、渗漏的原因及其对策,该分析方法也适用于其它PET吹塑制品.
